code: import'./Call.css';import React,{useState}from"react";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faArrowRight}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{useContactForm}from'./ContactFormContext';import ContactForm from'./ContactForm';import LoadingSpinner from'./LoadingSpinner';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Call=()=>{const{showContactForm,openContactForm}=useContactForm();const[isLoading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleButtonClick=()=>{setLoading(true);setTimeout(()=>{setLoading(false);openContactForm();},2000);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"call",className:"call-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"call-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"call-over-title",children:"Let's get started"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"call-section-title",children:["Schedule a ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"call-span",children:"FREE"})," Discovery Call!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"call-section-paragraph",children:"Schedule a free 30 minute call so we can go over what your needs are and see if we are the right agency for you."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"call-button",onClick:handleButtonClick,children:["SCHEDULE A CALL ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faArrowRight,style:{marginLeft:'8px'}})," "]})]}),showContactForm&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactForm,{}),isLoading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingSpinner,{})]});};export default Call;
